## Motivation

## Sections Affected

- [ ] Section X.Y: description of change

## Type of Change

- [ ] Editorial (typo, clarification, formatting)
- [ ] Normative (changes requirements or behaviour)
- [ ] New feature (new file type, new section)
- [ ] Schema/Validation (JSON Schema or test vector changes)

## Checklist

- [ ] Change is consistent with existing spec language
- [ ] RFC 2119 keywords used correctly (MUST, SHOULD, MAY)
- [ ] Examples updated if applicable
- [ ] JSON Schemas updated if applicable
- [ ] Test vectors added/updated if applicable
- [ ] No contradictions introduced with other sections
